mapper.select: select no, orders_no as ordersNo, option_no as optionNo, item_name as itemName, item_thumbnail as itemThumbnail, item_option_detail1 as itemOptionDetail1, item_option_detail2 as itemOptionDetail2, money, cnt from orders_item where orders_no=#{ordersNo} order by no asc
mapper.insert: insert into orders_item( no, orders_no, option_no, item_name, item_thumbnail, item_option_detail1, item_option_detail2, money, cnt ) values( null, #{ordersNo}, #{optionNo}, ( select name from item where no=(select distinct item_no from option where no=#{optionNo}) ), ( select thumbnail from item where no=(select distinct item_no from option where no=#{optionNo}) ), ( select b.option_name from option a, option_detail b where a.option_detail1=b.no and a.no=#{optionNo} ), ( select b.option_name from option a, option_detail b where a.option_detail2=b.no and a.no=#{optionNo} ), ( select money from item where no=(select item_no from option where no=#{optionNo}) ), #{cnt} );
